overview: Per Lindh holds a Master of Science degree in Computer Science and Engineering from LinkÃ¶ping Institute of Technology in Sweden, specializing in Software Engineering and Artificial Intelligence. Part of his academic degree was completed at The Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology (Australia), where he spent a year as a Postgraduate Student with top of class results. Per held the position as Systems Architect for Framfab from 1999 until he left the company during 2001 to pursue commercial opportunities with his and BjÃ¶rn LÃ¶ndahlâ€™s information retrieval invention, which remains the core technology behind Silobreaker.
